strings.Value: {n}As you pick up the purse, a jubilant scream comes from the bushes, and someone or something starts yanking on the rope — so hard you almost stumble.{/n}
{n}Rather than fight it, you let go off the purse. It flies into the bushes with a KRAK, followed by a howling scream. A group of goblins emerge, snarling and shaking their fists.{/n}

{n}Before you can react, you're pulled to the bushes still holding the purse. There, waiting for you, is a snare, surrounded by a band of goblins, screaming triumphantly. They snatch up their weapons and leap to attack!{/n}
{n}Whoever is holding the rope, he's strong — keeping a grip on the purse, you try to keep your footing, but you're being dragged into the bushes!{/n}

{n}A large coin purse lies in the middle of the road. The purse is tied to a rope, awkwardly covered with dust as if to mask its presence — the rope winds its way to a cluster of dense bushes nearby.{/n}
{n}You pull the rope and there is a shout. A moment later, a band of goblins leaps out from the bushes, screaming and shouting.{/n}
